data.actual_result: The field allows any number of characters to be entered and submitted, and will set that as the role name, regardless of length.
data.expected_result: The field stops accepting characters or throws an error when finished typing.
data.short_description: Role names accept more characters than on desktop.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to edit any role. - Type in a really long name that would be cut off on other platforms.
